Title: Awards grants to municipalities for capital improvement projects; appropriation
Summary: Awards grants to municipalities for any non-transportation related capital improvement projects with a maximum cumulative grant award not exceeding $250,000; makes an appropriation therefor.
LawCode: Amd ยง54, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to awarding grants to municipalities for capital improvement projects; and making an appropriation therefor
